choices: use the ropes to tie him hog-tied
use the chains to tie him spread-eagle
1.content:
A lugia stands in the grass field. He is all alone. He looksl ike a normal lugia except black and red. He dosen't see you coming. You have a job, tickle the lugia for 3 hours and give the data to professor oak.

You have the best tickling tools at your diposal...but should you use the ropes or chains
1.title: a lugia...

11.content: You take some rope and quickly surprise the Lugia. In his shock you grab his wings and pull them behind his back. You then get some more rope and tie down his ankles and tail. What will you do now?
11.title: Use the Rope!

112.content: You run your fingers down his feet. He started giggling and laughed. "Hahahahahahahahahahaha." what will you do now?
112.title: Use your hands?

113.content:
You pick a tool that looks like a bottle. On it spells `Ticklon.'

You turn it over and read the details:
Who or whatever you spray this on will become twenty times more ticklish than they usually should be. Beware, overspraying will result in making the victim pass out.

It seemed like quite an interesting formula. You decide to use it but where will you spray the Lugia?
113.title: Ticklon Spray

choices: Put some Ticklon on him somewhere else?
1131.content: You spray the ticklon on the Lugia's feet. It shivers ever so slightly. It must be quite cold. Then you take two feathers, one in each hand and start stroking both of Lugia's soles. It automatically went into major hysterias and kept on thrashing about. Tears were flooding from its eyes as the ticklon made his feet twenty times more ticklish. The Lugia was in such a hysteria that it seemed as if it were in agony. Still, you have an assignment to do.
1131.title: Twenty Times Ticklish!

11311.content:
You then decide that feathers have been used already and you want to tickle him with something else.
What should you tickle him with?
11311.title: Keep tickling his feet?

choices: Give him a good foot massage
113111.content: You decide to tickle him using your hands. You find that lugia's feet feel quite nice. They are smooth and what feathery and are quite lush when you squeeze them. Lugia starts to giggle, but the feathers seemed to have had a slightly larger effect on lugia than the hands. You don't care, you keep using your hands to tickle lugia's cares away. So now what?
113111.title: use your hands

choices: Continue the tickling with your tongue.
Suck on Lugia's toes to make him relax.
1131111.content: As you tickled Lugia with your hands, you wandered how his feet taste. With big white feet with three large toes each, what could go wrong? Besides he's bound. As you start licking Lugia's soles with your tongue, he begins to giggle uncontrollably. The smoothness of his feet feels so good on your tongue that you just don't want to stop. As Lugia continues to giggle, you work your tongue in a multitute of ways. You lick the sides of his feet, the arches, and the heels until they're covered in your saliva. You than ponder about what to do about Lugia's toes...
1131111.title: Tickle with tounge

1131112.content: You get tired of tickling lugia. You decide to give him a foot rub. Lugia doesn't mind at all. You decide to let him down while he is still tied and start massaging his feet. You sit down and put his feet between your legs. Lugia is still giggling a bit because of the formula you put on his feet, but rather enjoys it. His feet feel good to touch, so light, and his toes cutely move back and forth as you do it. Lugia is happy!
1131112.title: Give him a good foot massage

11311121.content: You keep massaging lugia's feet, which are the most amazing feet you've ever seen. As you softly move down the crevices of his feet, you move up to his toes which are white and smooth. You then move to his soles which are round and somewhat rough, but have a good feeling to it. After a while, you untie lugia, thank him for the fun, and head off to tickle more pokemon.
11311121.title: keep massaging

113112.content:
You get tired of using feathers. You think lugia's feet are so sexy and good you decide to lick them to tickle him! As you lick his white, warm, smooth feet, you realize how ticklish lugia gets. It start giggling so hard it can hardly keep still. It struggles a lot, which causes the ropes to tighten around his ankles, but it seems to enjoy it. As you lick the middle of his paws you can see that lugia's feet are quite smooth like skin, yet they are somewhat feathery. You also enjoy the taste of them, not exactly sweaty or smelly, but sweet. So you lick some more and lugia can't help but laugh some more.
But something happens...
113112.title: use your tounge

choices: lugia takes you to his cave
1131121.content: Just when you realize what happens Lugia breaks free of the ropes. You become terrified and try to run away, but lugia grabs you with his wing and looks at you strangely. You wonder what will happen next....
1131121.title: lugia breaks free

11311212.content:
You try to move but you can't.You watch as the Lugia starts to fly."Please!" you said,"I was only doing an experiment",you plead but the Lugia ignores you.
In the distant you see a mountian with a small hole in it,as you get closer it appears that the hole is a cave.
11311212.title: lugia takes you to his cave

113112121.content:
The Lugia takes you in aparently it looks aroused when you were tickling it
it looks at you . As you look down at between it's legs...
113112121.title: The lugia takes you in.

choices: Tickle the back of his knee!
1132.content:
You then sprayed Lugia's belly, Lugia shivered, it must have been cold.
You put the Ticklon down and touch a finger to Lugia's belly, Lugia jerked away with a snicker. Curious, you rub two fingers on his belly. Then Lugia screamed in laughter. So then you start tickling him, full blast. And Lugia SHRIEKED in laughter. He began begging you to stop, but of course you had a job to do.

What now?
1132.title: His belly

12.content:
You catch the lugia and chain it up so I's a X shape

It gets worried. You then figure out where you should tickle it.
12.title: Lugia X

121.content:
You take a feather and drag it up his feet! He yelps and laughs, tyring to break free!

"HEHEHEHEHEAHAHAHAH" you keep going, not stopping
121.title: NOT THE FEET!

1211.content:
You then decide to make him yelp so you take the feather and gently brush the Lugia's smoothe white toes. He laughs, hysterically. You decide to ignore his pleas and continue tickling those toes of his.
What will you do now?
1211.title: Tickling those toes!

12111.content: You drag the feather all over his huge white toes then you move to his sole. Lugia begins to thrash about but he is tied down to tight to escape. Whilst tickling him you notice that his big feet are starting to sweat so you then...
12111.title: More toe tickling

121111.content: You start at his heels which send shivers down his spine. You notive that and go higher now licking his sensitive arches. Lugia begins to trash widly like before and tears start to form on his eyes
121111.title: Lick his feet

1211111.content:
You place you mouth over his toes and start sucking on his large, plump toes. You notice that while the tears are rolling down his face and the laughing remained constant, his spastic thrashing around his legs have gone from thrashing to twitching in fact you think you heard a moan or two between laughs.

What do you do?
1211111.title: Suck on his toes

121112.content: You smell his feet and they smeel horable. You decide that he needs his feet washed, but where should you wash first?
121112.title: Smell his feet

1211121.content: You take out a scrub brush and a bucket of soapy water. You dip the brush in the water, and scrub up and down his soles. lugia laughs madly and squirms around madly. You stop after a few minute later and smeel his soles again, and they still smell a bit, but not as much as before. What now?
1211121.title: scrub his soles

choices: Play with his feet for a while
12111212.content: You decide to scrub his toes. Lugia's toes seem to be very delacate, so he laughs even harder. You start to love the way he laughs, so you scrub harder. Poor lugia tries to break free, but only seems to make his situation worse. After your done scrubbing his feet you smell them to make sure they are clean. They smell netter, but they still have the aroma of his feet. The smell gets you very interested and makes you feel somewhta erotic? What should you do now?
12111212.title: scrub his toes

121112122.content:
You were getting bored with cleaning, but you love the way Lugia laughs. So you decide to pay with him for a while.
You kneel down and squeeze his feet, he begins giggling helplessly. You try to experiment for a while, so you use a bunch of different tools on him.

What do you use?
121112122.title: Play with his feet for a while

1212.content: you start to tickle his belly and he laughs and he tries to get away
1212.title: tickle somewhere else!

122.content:
You hop on his belly and tickle with a long feather!

"GAHAHEHEHAHAHAHNOHOHOOHEHAHAHA" you make little designs, and he bucks and wiggles around
122.title: belly tickles!

1221.content: You change tactics and put the feather to one side. Then you start wriggling your fingers hastily all over his belly. He thrashes about trying ever so hard to resist but failing. You then see his tail whacking about in his laughing hysteria. This gives you an idea.
1221.title: Scratch that Belly!

12212.content:
You put down the feather and begin wiggling your fingers in circles on his belly.GWAHAHAHAHAH!!!!!!!!!! Lugia thrashes crazly trying to break free...You stop tickling his belly.


What now?
12212.title: Wow! Your very ticklish...

122121.content: you pull out two long feathers from a Noctowl, then leap on the legendary pokemon's belly. then, you put one feather in each hand and drive the feathers up and down his sides. "ROOOOOAAHHHAHAHAOORR!" the beast cries in a flurry of laughing and squealing.
122121.title: Tickle his sides!

1222.content:
as you move around he laughs even harder.


where next?
1222.title: to the ribs

12221.content:
Then you grab his ankle and lift it up, and then you grab a feather and rub it on lugia's foot.
"GWAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" the Lugia shrieked, then he began giggling hysterically.
That didn't seem to tickle him very much, so then you drop the feather and wiggle your fingers on his foot.
The Lugia began laughing helplessly and begging you to stop, but of course you have a job to do.

What to do now?
12221.title: oh come on! It's obvious! To the feet we go!

123.content:
You go to under his wings and tickle with your fingers.

YAHAHAHAHHAAHAHAHAHAHHAHAH!! You struggles to break loose.
123.title: Under tickles

124.content:
You move between his legs and tickle both of the thighs.


NOHOHOHOHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!!
He tries get out of the chains but they're too strong
124.title: Ticklish Thighs

info.brief_description: a ticklish lugia is at your mercy!
info.description: A lugia is out in the grass. You have a bunch of ticklnig tools at your disposal, have your way with him! Go ahead and add your own chapters, rating it just in case someone wants to get a bit dirty, and the lugia is ticklish everywhere ;)
